title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes in English Language and any three (3) of

 

1. Agricultural Science

2. Mathematics

3. Chemistry

4. Biology

5. Health Science

6. Integrated/Rural Science

7. Physics

8. Nature Study and

9. General Science.

 

NB

GROUP A:

1. Agricultural Science

2. Biology

3. Nutrition

4. Health Science.

5. Applied Biology

 

GROUP B:

1. Physics

2. Chemistry

3. Mathematics

4.Basic Mathematics/Arithmetic Process

5. Economics

6. Geography

7. Social Studies

8. Integrated Science

9. General Science
subjects: Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Biology/General Science or Mathematics.

title: ARABIC MEDIUM
utme_requirements: SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies and any other subjects.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: ARABIC/ENGLISH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Arabic and English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, any other subject.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: ARABIC/HAUSA
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Hausa and any other subject.

title: ARABIC/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Islamic Studies and any other subject.
subjects: Arabic, Islamic Studies and any other Arts subject.

title: BIOLOGY/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes, in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry any other Science subject.

title: BIOLOGY/GEOGRAPHY
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes, in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Geography and any other Science/Social Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Geography and any other from Science/Social Science subject.

title: CHEMISTRY/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Physics and any other Science/Social Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Economics, Mathematics/Physics and Chemistry.

title: ENGLISH/HAUSA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics,  Hausa, Literature in English and any other Arts  subject.
subjects: Literature in English and any other Arts subject

title: ENGLISH/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Geography/Social Studies.
subjects: Literature in English and any of Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: GEOGRAPHY/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two (2) of Science/Social Sciences.
subjects: Mathematics, Geography and any other Science/Social Science subject.

title: HAUSA/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Hausa, Islamic Studies  and any Arts subject.
subjects: Hausa, Islamic Studies and any other Arts subject.

title: HAUSA/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Hausa and any two (2) of

1. Geography

2. History/Government

3. Islamic Studies/Christian Religious Studies

4. Economics
subjects: Hausa and any other two (2) Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.
